name: Free climber
text: When climbing or falling, treat it as though it were half as high.

name: Gymnast
text: If you aren't Restricted or in a choke point, add your athletics score to combat.

name: Jockey
text: Your steed gets +1 to AGI checks.

name: Mark athletic
text: Whenever you beat someone at a check involving this skill, you may Mark them aeob. Take +1 to all checks against a Marked target except ones involving this skill. You may maintain one (additional) Mark at a time. Marks last indefinitely or until you cancel them (modifier).

name: Parkour
text: You can climb up to AGI+athletics metres in one round. You can wall run twice as far as you can long jump, and you can wall jump twice as high as you can high jump.

name: Second wind
text: Negate the check penalty from up to 2 @fatigue@.

name: Sprint
text: If you have no @fatigue@, take +3 to athletics and fight checks ueor and take 1 @fatigue@ aeor.

name: Stoic
text: Take no athletics penalty from @armour@.

name: Stubborn
text: +1 focus.

name: Warm up
text: Whenever you do an athletics check during battle, get +1 athletics ueob.

name: Anbinden
text: On landing a melee hit and when not flanked, enter blade bind with the target for one round. While blade bound, you can't be intercepted from clashing with them, and the check is POW+fight symmetric, not AGI+fight. This is chainable.

name: Berserkergang
text: Ueob, enter berserkergang. Lose 2 focus abor, and all hits you inflict are crits. The focus loss can cause you to faint and take @injury@.

name: Disarm
text: Instead of inflicting damage with a melee clash, you knock the weapon from your opponent's hand.

name: Fighting withdrawal
text: When attacked, move away from the opponent and bring them with you. Works even if you both attack each other.

name: Giant slayer
text: Negate up to 3 size classes for purposes of damage reduction when fighting larger opponents.

name: Lancer
text: When you close from ranged to melee while mounted, inflict a @crit@.

name: Leadership
text: A target ally gets +1 ueor. Multiple instances of this don't stack.

name: Mark fight
text: Whenever you beat someone at a check involving this skill, you may Mark them aeob. Take +1 to all checks against a Marked target except ones involving this skill. You may maintain one (additional) Mark at a time. Marks last indefinitely or until you cancel them (modifier).

name: Overwhelming
text: If a single hit inflicts at least 2/3 of a target's maximum focus (rounded up), it incapacitates them.

name: Pain tolerant
text: Negate the check penalty from up to 2 points of @injury@.

name: Reckless
text: Take -1 to any clashes, and the outcome is a @crit@, including for the opponent. NB: this is clash-specific.

name: Taunt
text: When you defend an ally, intercept all opponents attacking her.

name: Trample
text: If opponents intercept and if max(defender.POW)+num_defenders < POW, they pre-empt rather than interrupt.

name: Wind up
text: This round, take -3. Next round, take +2.

name: Calming
text: Your mount doesn't bolt when hit.

name: Forager
text: While travelling, you may check MET+knowledge vs 20. On success, find paikera along the way.

name: Intuitive
text: 1 time per session you may ask the GM an out-of-character question. He shouldn't answer outright, but should give a good hint, advice, or Socratic counter-question.

name: Kinbakushi
text: Ordinarily, to wriggle out of being tied up is AGI+ath vs MET+knowledge, either escaping or taking 1 @injury@ and alerting anyone nearby. With this, instead the penalty is that they can't try again and must be untied, and you get +5 to tying checks (including when you're the one tied up).

name: Lockpicking
text: Pick a lock, with a MET+knowledge check if there's time pressure or a trap or something.

name: Mark knowledge
text: Whenever you beat someone at a check involving this skill, you may Mark them aeob. Take +1 to all checks against a Marked target except ones involving this skill. You may maintain one (additional) Mark at a time. Marks last indefinitely or until you cancel them (modifier).

name: Medic
text: You can receive assistance for first aid checks. Take +5 to them too.

name: Proficiency
text: +2 to checks related to some non-adventurer task.

name: Seductive
text: Check MAS+knowledge vs END+knowledge to get someone to do something they really don't want.

name: Streetwise
text: You know a guy who knows a guy.

name: Tea lover
text: Once each morning, prepare a thermos of tea, counting as a +3 focus potion. You can take this multiple times and prepare additional doses. Unused doses expire in the morning.

name: Bookworm
text: You may learn twice as many spells.

name: Combat caster
text: When fighting with spells, add your magic skill to your combat.

name: Gnostic
text: You may channel two blue spells at the same time. Any effects are maxed, not stacked (eg if one gives +3 vigilance and another gives +4, you get +4, not +7). If you're channelling two spells when Crisis is declared, you can't cast other spells until it ends.

name: Irongut
text: You may drink an additional potion per battle without side effects.

name: Manaburn
text: Trade in a +1 magic token for +3 magic ueor.

name: Mark magic
text: Whenever you beat someone at a check involving this skill or successfully cast a spell at them, you may Mark them aeob. Take +1 to all checks against a Marked target except ones involving this skill. You may maintain one (additional) Mark at a time. Marks last indefinitely or until you cancel them (modifier).

name: Shapeshifter
text: Per level of magic, you may learn an animal shape that you may assume as a spell. (eg if this is your third magic boon, you may immediately learn up to 3 animals, and then 1 more for each subsequent skill-up.) To learn a shape has the same requirements as learning a new spell in terms of time and money.

name: Spellbook
text: Pick a colour: you may learn and cast spells of that colour.

name: Aim
text: Pick a target unaware of you; next round, if you sneak attack, it is a @crit@.

name: Careful
text: Take no stealth penalty from @armour@.

name: Forgettable
text: Gain a sneak attack whenever you attack someone who is neither attacking nor defending.

name: Inventive
text: You may make two different styles of traps, wherein whenever a trap is revealed, only other traps of the same style are revealed.

name: Mark stealth
text: Whenever you beat someone at a check involving this skill, you may Mark them aeob. Take +1 to all checks against a Marked target except ones involving this skill. You may maintain one (additional) Mark at a time. Marks last indefinitely or until you cancel them (modifier).

name: Ninjutsu
text: When you land a successful sneak attack, you aren't revealed, although the victim can probably figure out there's an attacker nearby and you must make another check to inflict another sneak attack.

name: Nonchalant
text: When you fail a hide check, instead of being revealed, you lose focus as per a POW roll; however, you also leave a bit of evidence such as a footprint or bit of hair, which will be found if you don't remove it with a successful hide check.

name: Pickpocket
text: When you pass a stealth check, instead of hiding or sneak attacking, you take an item from the target that they aren't wearing. If they also aren't holding it, you aren't revealed.

name: Trap maker
text: You may make hidden traps as per the Traps page.

name: Ventriloquist
text: Can project voice with a MAS+stealth vs MET+vigilance check, to give a false location or make listeners think someone else is speaking.

name: Grenadier
text: When using an @indirect@ weapon from behind cover, opponents can't used ranged attacks without indirect against you.

name: Lip reader
text: Check hidden MET+vigilance vs 10 to read lips.

name: Mark vigilance
text: Whenever you beat someone at a check involving this skill, you may Mark them aeob. Take +1 to all checks against a Marked target except ones involving this skill. You may maintain one (additional) Mark at a time. Marks last indefinitely or until you cancel them (modifier).

name: Marksman
text: During ranged engagements, add your vigilance to your combat, and you have @suppress@.

name: Overwatch
text: Increase the bonus for engaging from the high ground at range to +5.

name: Pre-sight
text: Take +5 when engaging opponents who are in a choke point at range.

name: Scotopic
text: You have darkvision 10m: take no penalty from darkness.

name: Snipe
text: When shooting into melee, damage from friendly fire is capped at 4.

name: Vanguard
text: When an ally would blunder into a trap, if you would have passed the spot check, you shout a warning in time to save them.
